titles.title: ABLE Financial Planning Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow rollovers between 529 programs and ABLE accounts.
ABLE Financial Planning Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
ABLE Financial Planning Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-free rollovers of amounts in qualified tuition programs (529 plans) to qualified ABLE programs and from qualified ABLE programs to qualified tuition programs. (Tax-favored ABLE [Achieving a Better Life Experience] accounts are designed to enable individuals with disabilities to save for and pay for disability-related expenses.)
